title: Blonde in Bondage 1957 | Anita Thallaug, Mark Miller, Lars Ekborg | Full Movie

sources.title: Blonde in Bondage 1957 | Anita Thallaug, Mark Miller, Lars Ekborg | Full Movie
sources.description:
IN THE SPOTLIGHT SHE TEASED...IN THE SHADOWS SHE COLLECTED HER PAYCHECK IN SHAME! 
A reporter (Mark Miller) tries to help a drug-addicted cabaret dancer (Anita Thallaug) who has criminal ties to the Swedish underworld.

Original title: Blondin i fara  AKA: Narkotika

Colorized version https://youtu.be/Qbxez3KDmNk

Director: Robert Brandt
Writers: Peter Bourne, BÃ¶rje Nyberg
Stars: Mark Miller, Lars Ekborg, Anita Thallaug
Genres: Colorized classics, Crime, Drama

00:00 Full Movie
02:02 A man named Larry goes on a trip to Sweden for a special assignment.
10:59 A car gets stuck in a ditch and the driver meets a couple who are performers in a show.
27:26 Mona is addicted to drugs and Max is her supplier, but an American newspaper man is trying to help her.
47:57 A man confronts a woman named Mona about her whereabouts, but she refuses to tell him; they end up at a club together.
1:04:18 Larry asks Ingrid and Brigida to look after a girl who is trying to get out of her drug addiction.
1:08:25 A journalist named Brian Van discovers a narcotics gang operating in Stockholm and offers to help the police catch them.
1:18:31 A dangerous criminal threatens a man named Mr. Brown and his associate Mona, leading to a series of events involving drugs and murder.
